name: Brokn
description:
Brokn is a adventure horror game. AI and robots have gotten a bit too smart and are taking over. They think they are better then humans and want to get rid of them all. can you get out of this robot infested Warehouse? 

Any donations would be appreciated! 

Please let me know in the comments what you'd like to see in this game and if you'd like a longer version at some point.
